description: HTML source code for a web-based database viewer interface, including styles and client-side JavaScript logic for loading and displaying database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles display of tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML markup for the data table from fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML content for each cell, handling objects, long text, null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on click to show full data.
